ygData.subject: RE: BQ (Bards Quarterly) A few words about bards and fa shion (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I had a chance at some Bronze not too long ago and turned it down. Personally I prefer the way my Banded looks over Bronze.. I don t want to walk around
ygData.messageBody:
> Marr duel weilding it :). Any way, am I crazy or does
> anyone else use lesser items in favor of how they
> look?

I had a chance at some Bronze not too long ago and turned it down.
Personally I prefer the way my Banded looks over Bronze.. I don't want to
walk around looking like I came out of an orange grove. (I dont know which
is better between banded or bronze as I was never interested in the bronze)
However, I've been desperately searching for a replacement head piece for
the banded one I have. How tacky.
